description: Complete PRO-CTCAE library with all 78 validated symptom terms (118 items) plus 4 critical safety monitoring items for chemotherapy (3 items)

items.question_text: In the last 7 days, how OFTEN did you have PAIN IN THE ABDOMEN (BELLY AREA)?
In the last 7 days, what was the SEVERITY of your PAIN IN THE ABDOMEN (BELLY AREA) at its WORST?
In the last 7 days, how much did PAIN IN THE ABDOMEN (BELLY AREA) INTERFERE with your usual or daily activities?
In the last 7 days, did you have HAIR LOSS?
In the last 7 days, what was the SEVERITY of your INABILITY TO HAVE AN ORGASM at its WORST?
In the last 7 days, what was the SEVERITY of your DECREASED APPETITE at its WORST?
In the last 7 days, how much did DECREASED APPETITE INTERFERE with your usual or daily activities?
In the last 7 days, how OFTEN did you feel ANXIOUS?
